data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: Laurel and Dan were driving through a town in their new diesel car. It was a nice town, where people were extremely welcoming and happy. They stopped at the local inn and found themselves in the company of some lovely ladies. They were offered free drinks and they found a nice hot meal to warm their bodies. Ahh, but it was time to go since they couldn't be there forever. Little did they know that they were stuck there. the locals needed gas to prepare their meal, so they used a pump to suck all the petrol out of their car. Luckly, they had some horses they could exchange for the car, if they could tame them.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: The dogs were pulling the sleigh hard. It was already very late and she had to be on time at the post office to send the letter, otherwise she could miss the deadline. She received an award for her book about life in Alaska, and she had to be there for the ceremony. The stamp was getting wet because the dogs went straight through a big pile of snow. She led them through there, as she was so excited to get on time that she completely forgot about the storm that happened last night. Aw, just saw I should have written about something else.  I'm confused of all the letters my mothers has collected over the years. They are from a royal family member. It's weird, as most people send letters, not collect them, or collect stamps. I remember seeing a hug

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: the surgery was difficult and long. The patient's organ had failed at the last minute. It was a heart failure, and the surgeon is not positive she did her best, although every step in the operation was strictly followed and she had to comply with the patient's needs. In this day and age, we don't expect to fail during surgery, an entire empire of lawyers is waiting outside of the operating room to hear of your failure. still, there is hope she could explain all to the family and the other doctors support her decision.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: I am ready to make the payment for my coffee. I love how the smell of coffee helps me get over the feelings of gloom I had recently. The darkness tells me I should not exist, but coffee makes it all better. It's the rush I get through my brain and body that makes me feel myself.
